channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to Think About Risk: Howard Marks’s Comprehensive Guide
item.description: Howard Marks’s approach to risk emphasizes the importance of understanding risk as the probability of loss, not volatility, and managing it through ca...

item.title: Malaysia’s only casino is in the political crosshairs as an Islamic party calls for its closure
item.description: The casino, operating since 1969, is in a state the Parti Islam SeMalaysia, an Islamic political party, wants to win.

item.title: Tammy Baldwin faces conflict of interest concerns over partner's Wall Street gig
item.description: Baldwin is being criticized for not disclosing her partner's assets or clients because they are unmarried despite purchasing a home together.

item.description: It is time for a bipartisan declaration of American solidarity against Putin’s aggression.

item.title: Distress Investing: Crime Scene Investigation
item.description: In the underbelly of private markets lies the main culprit behind corporate failures: defective capital structuring.

item.title: Michael O’Leary says Ryanair’s value is depressed because he keeps calling people idiots
item.description: "We’re fighting some union or some minister or I’m calling some minister an idiot or they’re calling me an idiot,” O'Leary said.

item.title: Despite the Republican Party, the March for Life Goes On

item.description: A second assassination attempt is no surprise considering Democrats’ commitment to fanning the political flames.

item.description: Don't ignore serial dependencies in your factor portfolio.

item.description: These carefully redesigned built environments, compelling stories, and authentic experiences would in fact be well worth an admission fee.
